channel.title: ordering on because there are just too many things to remember
channel.description: Recent content in ordering on because there are just too many things to remember

item.title: Resources worth bookmarking and other jq lessons
item.description: It’s been a while since the last lesson. In that time, my computer died and was repaired and I’ve finally got things back together. Today we’re going to dive into more useful jq things, but I’m also going to refer to resources worth bookmarking. First up: jqterm. This is a fantastic tool to test your queries iteractively. It does almost everything you could do in a terminal on your laptop, and gives immediate visual feedback.
